description: Try our easy to follow Shaved Fennel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Shaved Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and discard the tough outer layer of the fennel. Cut out the hard core. Use a serrated knife to slice the fennel crosswise as thinly as possible. Transfer to a large bowl. Whisk the oil and vinegar in a small bowl, and season with salt and pepper. Add 1 tbsp of the dressing to the fennel with the garlic, toss, and let stand for 1 hour.
Toss the mixed greens with the remaining dressing and season with salt and pepper. Divide the greens among 6 plates, then top with equal amounts of the fennel salad, and serve.
